Statute.Title: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, the Civil Marriage Act and the Criminal Code and to make consequential amendments to other Acts, An Act to amend An Act to amend the

Text.Emphasis: (Formerly: Zero Tolerance for Barbaric Cultural Practices Act)

Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Immigration et la Protection des réfugiés, la Loi sur le mariage civil, le Code criminel et d’autres lois en conséquence, Loi modifiant la Loi sur l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 29, in force on assent 18.06.2015, except

Item.Text: — s. 2 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 3 — Not in force
— ss. 6 to 15 in force 17.07.2015 see SI/2015-67

CIF.Text: EEV, 2018, ch. 15 en vigueur à la sanction 21.06.2018
